defaultBikes.description: Slow Initial Rendering: Since the data is fetched from the server before rendering, initial load times can be slow, resulting in a less-than-ideal user experience.
Loading States: Users may experience an in-between or loading state, as they wait for the data to be rendered on the page.
Lack of Interactivity: There isnâ€™t much opportunity for interactivity with the user until the data has been fully loaded and rendered on the page.
